author: Peter Wilding
review: Walter translated my vision into reality. He has incredible technical skills and puts a huge emphasis on user experience and visual taste. He’s committed, reliable, and challenges your ideas with alternative solutions.

author: Younes El miri
review:
Walter Clayton was my manager as a web developer, he supervised me as it should.
 He has a sense of project management and has a very good vision and knowledge of Frontend design (UI/UX).

author: Beatriz Paiva
review: I worked with Walter on a project for NTT Data and he was one of the people I immediately got along well with. He is an excellent professional, always willing to help and always in a good mood. I really enjoyed working with him and would work with him again if I had the opportunity. His energy is contagious!

author: Juliet Carter
review: I have been working with Walter at Finlight. We collaborate on website development creating visually engaging landing pages that are SEO optimised. Walter has a great team spirit, he’s an excellent communicator and excels in UX and UI design.

author: Jean-Bernard Tanqueray
review: Walter has a strong intuition when it comes to design and UX. He is genuinely curious and asks strong questions and demonstrates real customer empathy.

author: Virgile Barbieux
review: Walter is hard working and always stays motivated no matter how difficult the task might be. His positive attitude and willingness to help make him a great asset. His ability to design screens and think about the UX is one of his greatest strengths.

author: Chrysanthi Katrini
review: Walter is motivated, forward-thinking with exceptional technical skills. Capable of adapting in new working environments and with positive attitude towards work. Walter will be an asset to any company.
